channel.title: Git on Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Handbook

item.title: Common Commands
item.description: Rename branch # git branch -m NEW_BRANCH_NAME Ignore local file modifications # git update-index --no-skip-worktree /path/to/file Delete a Git branch locally # git branch --delete <branchname> See also How to delete a Git branch locally. Update submodules recursively # git submodule update --init --recursive See also Git update submodules recursively Config proxy # git config --global https.proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890 git config --global https.proxy https://127.0.0.1:7890 git config --global --unset http.proxy git config --global --unset https.
